§ 134. Simplified acquisition threshold In division B, the term “simplified acquisition threshold” means $250,000. (Pub. L. 111–350, § 3, Jan. 4, 2011, 124 Stat. 3682; Pub. L. 115–91, div. A, title VIII, § 805, Dec. 12, 2017, 131 Stat. 1456.)
